public abstract class Average
extends java.lang.Object

Running average of a sequence of values.

phantomGet

public abstract double phantomGet(double y)
Compute running average assuming last element of sequence is y. Don't actually include it in the sequence.

Parameters:
y - hypothetical last value of sequence.
Returns:
average assuming last value of sequence is y
